definition: one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)
"eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
to visit (a meeting, class, trial etc)
to be duty bound/to be one's unshirkable responsibility
to act as though there were nobody else present/unselfconscious/fig. without regard for others
to watch with folded arms (idiom); to look on without lifting a finger
to make insinuations/to take an indirect approach (in making inquiries) (idiom)
the cool eye of a bystander/a detached point of view

sentences.english: Huizhou located at Xizhi Jiang nearby, the fine scenery, suits the housing.
sentences.chinese: 惠州位于西枝江旁，风景优美，适合居住。

sentences.english: He stood, huddled by the open fire, gazing at the dying embers.
sentences.chinese: 他只是木然地站在炉火旁，看着那渐渐灭去的灰烬。

sentences.english: A vendor rests next to watermelons at a fruit market in Hangzhou, east China's Zhejiang province May 16, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 浙江杭州一水果市场里，小贩在成堆的西瓜旁小憩。

sentences.english: When I reached his table, I stood behind the chair across from him, unsure.
sentences.chinese: 我走到他的桌子旁，不太确定地站在他对面的椅子后。

sentences.english: Some mourners wrote inscriptions on the wooden barriers of the pools.
sentences.chinese: 有些悼念者还在水池旁的木框上写下话语。

sentences.english: Hey you, out there on your own, Sitting naked by the phone.
sentences.chinese: 喂，那个独自一人，只身坐在电话旁的你。

sentences.english: Listen again and follow the instructions next to the pictures.
sentences.chinese: 再听一遍录音，边听边读图画旁的说明。

sentences.english: Bamboo fence that lines the dying rose, hurt people 's heart.
sentences.chinese: 竹篱笆旁那株即将凋谢的玫瑰，刺痛了路人的心。

sentences.english: The dog was sniffing (at) the lamp-post.
sentences.chinese: 那条狗在灯柱旁嗅来嗅去。

sentences.english: Our fur-clad descendents will be crouched over fires.
sentences.chinese: 我们的子孙将穿裘裹皮，蜷缩在火堆旁。

sentences.english: ZJMP is located beside the outside round in the west suburb of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 公司位于上海西郊外环路旁。

sentences.english: The old road beside the waterfall place is Jianguo Ridge, leading to Jianguo Village at the hill above.
sentences.chinese: 瀑布群旁就是建国岭，通往山顶的建国村。

sentences.english: Hanging a gourd on the wall next to your front door is thought to bring wealth and fortune.
sentences.chinese: 在大门口旁可以挂上一个葫芦，一般认为可招财纳福。

sentences.english: A second stone man followed, landing back beside the tiller.
sentences.chinese: 接着是第二个石人，他降落在船舵旁。

sentences.english: He uttered the word indifferently, and as though his mind were on something else.
sentences.chinese: 他随口说了这句话，仿佛他还在想着旁的事。

sentences.english: You picture the family by the fire, the student lighting and relighting his pipe.
sentences.chinese: 想到围坐在炉火旁的一家人，一个不断点烟斗的学者。

definition: suffix of a noun of locality
to be right next to/to lean closely against
Qiaotou or Chiaotou township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
either end of a bridge/a bridgehead
